title: FAA to test anti-drone tech for pinpointing illegal operators near airports
text:
FAA to test anti-drone tech for pinpointing illegal operators near airports 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
With reports of drones flying near airports on the increase, the FAA is keen to find a solution before the unthinkable happens. As part of i...
